name: Hall of the Kunger Binb: Episode I
name_original: Hall of the Kunger Binb: Episode I
description:
[FULL SCREEN HIGHLY RECOMMENDED]

Hall of the Kunger Binb: Episode 1
Discord of ZZT Link: https://discord.com/invite/Nar4Upf

Get lost in the living world that is the Kunger Binb's improbable castle! As you plunge deeper into the labyrinthine and bizarre core, piece by piece the mysteries of the Palisp are revealed.  Will your discoveries hold you true to the Binb's quest, or lead you to betray it?

This game was made for a modern build of ZZT that lifted some restrictions and reduced the amount of raw code needed to deliver the experience.  With a single saved game tipping the scales at up to 2.3 MB, this by sheer size alone is the largest game in ZZT history. (There, I said it.)

This game is a love letter to absurdism, Neuschwanstein & other buildings designed by crazy people, classic inventory-based adventure games, and to the power of the Kunger Binb, who willed himself into existence for the benefit of all mankinb.

PRESENTED BY MEAN GIRLS GAMES

version 2.4d
